explains: n. 纵横字谜；纵横填字谜（等于 cross puzzle）
wordGroup: crossword puzzle 纵横字谜游戏

sentences.en: I've finished the crossword apart from 3 across and 10 down.
sentences.cn: 这份纵横字谜除横3竖10以外我都填完了。

sentences.en: Imagine doing crossword puzzles every day for 10 years, 1,000 years until forever.
sentences.cn: 想象往后每天做填字游戏，玩上十年、一千年以至永远。

sentences.en: Some of you may enjoy doing crossword puzzles and perhaps doing crossword puzzles a couple of hours a day is enjoyable.
sentences.cn: 你们之中可能有些人爱玩填字游戏，也许一天玩几小时的填字游戏是令人愉快的。
